cleaned_text: The Empowering Neurologist - David Perlmutter, MD and Dr. Derrick MacFabe In this video interview with [Dr. Derrick MacFabe](https://www.psychology.uwo.ca/autism/) we discuss the fascinating new research that connects changes in gut bacteria to autism spectrum disorder.
